00006 namespace {
00007   const unsigned RANDOM_SEED = 1;
00008   const unsigned NUM_STEPS = 5000;
00009   const unsigned OUTPUT_INTERVAL = 50;
00010   const std::string POLICY_FILENAME = "NewData/pi";
00011   const std::string VALUE_FUNCTION_FILENAME = "NewData/vf";
00012 }
00013 
00014 void set_random_seed()
00015 {
00016   std::stringstream random_seed_stream;
00017   random_seed_stream << "set-random-seed " << RANDOM_SEED;
00018   std::string random_seed_string = random_seed_stream.str();
00019   std::cout << RL_agent_message(random_seed_string.c_str());
00020   std::cout << RL_env_message(random_seed_string.c_str());
00021 }

00023 void write_value_function(unsigned i)
00024 {
00025   static const unsigned BUFFER_SIZE = 8;
00026   char buffer[BUFFER_SIZE];
00027   snprintf(buffer, BUFFER_SIZE, "%04d", i);
00028   std::stringstream message_stream;
00029   message_stream << "write-value-function " << VALUE_FUNCTION_FILENAME
00030                  << "." << buffer << ".dat";
00031   std::string message = message_stream.str();
00032   std::cout << RL_agent_message(message.c_str());
00033 }
00034 
00035 void write_policy(unsigned i)
00036 {
00037   static const unsigned BUFFER_SIZE = 8;
00038   char buffer[BUFFER_SIZE];
00039   snprintf(buffer, BUFFER_SIZE, "%04d", i);
00040   std::stringstream message_stream;
00041   message_stream << "write-policy " << POLICY_FILENAME
00042                  << "." << buffer << ".dat";
00043   std::string message = message_stream.str();
00044   std::cout << RL_agent_message(message.c_str());
00045 }
00046 
00047 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00048 {
00049   set_random_seed();
00050   
00051   RL_init();
00052   RL_start();
00053   const reward_observation_action_terminal_t *rl_step_result = NULL;
00054   for (unsigned i = 1; i <= NUM_STEPS; ++i) {
00055     rl_step_result = RL_step();
00056     if (i % OUTPUT_INTERVAL == 0) {
00057       write_value_function(i);
00058       write_policy(i);
00059     }
00060     if (rl_step_result->terminal)
00061       RL_start();
00062   }
00063   RL_cleanup();
00064   
00065   return 0;
00066 }
